title: client wont open
body: yesterday averything was ok, today i tried to open the client and nothing happend. It shows on the task manager for a couple of seconds and the it just disappears

replies.body: Give your PC a solid reboot just in case it crashed in the background.  If the issue persists then a setting with your OS or antivirus might be blocking the patcher from launching.  In such a case, your best bet is to go through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help fix this up.   Let me know if you have any questions!
